summary.para: Notification component. Adds desktop notification functionality using the notification API https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/notification.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.Notification.Notification
member.summary: Adds support for the Notification API: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/notification.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class together with the specified container.
member.param: A that represents the container for the component.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.Notification.Notification.Click
member.summary: Fired when the user clicks on a desktop notification.

member.param: A that contains the event data.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Notification.Notification.IsSupported
member.summary: Returns whether the client browser supports desktop notifications.
member.returns: true if the browser supports the Notification API.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Notification.Notification.Show(System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.param: The optional body string of the notification.
The or URL of the image used as an icon of the notification.
Indicates whether to activate the browser when the user clicks the notification.

member.summary: Processes the event from the client.
